meanings.definition: A type of porridge made from wheat or cornmeal.
meanings.sent1: The furmities at breakfast were warm and comforting.
meanings.sent2: She cooked a delicious pot of furmities for dinner.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous cat tried to steal a bite of the furmities when no one was looking.
meanings.sent4: The steam rising from the furmities resembled a fluffy cloud.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of the furmities filled the kitchen, making everyone hungry.

meanings.definition: A dish made from wheat or cornmeal cooked in milk or water.
meanings.sent1: Grandma's furmities recipe included a pinch of cinnamon for flavor.
meanings.sent2: The creamy furmities was a hit at the potluck.
meanings.sent3: The furmities bubbled over the pot, creating a sticky mess on the stove.
meanings.sent4: The golden color of the furmities reminded her of a sunset.
meanings.sent5: The children eagerly scooped up the last of the furmities from their bowls.
